properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Moa mafy 'zany alahelo !
Ilazao Jeso, ilazao Jeso.
Ho renao ilay feo mamelovelo;
'Ndeha ilazao Jeso.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Eny, mba lazao,
Aza efeninao,
entonao eo avokoa.
O, mba sahia
Fa Izy tena tia,
Lazao azt tokoa.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tebiteby ve sa fifaliana ?
Ilazao Jeso, ilazao Jeso.
Fahotana koa, ady fahoriana ?
'Ndeha ilazao Jeso.
Eny, mba lazao, sns

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Moa maro ve ny ahiahy ?
Ilazao Jeso, ilazao Jeso.
Izy tokinao, andrin'ny fanahy.
'Ndeha ilazao Jeso.
Eny, mba lazao, sns

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ary raha mamely izany rafy
Ilazao Jeso, ilazao Jeso.
Ny fitiavany dia manda mafy
'Ndeha ilazao Jeso.
Eny, mba lazao, sns
